content: this adorable book reader holder can be used to spruce up your bathroom and bring laughs to all who visit don t want to use it for tp no worries it also works great with small plants too supplies us f / 3 75 mm crochet hook lily sugar n cream cone weight 4 worsted 100% cotton 674 yds / 616 m 14 oz / 400 g per cone shown in color white plastic mesh canvas 1 sheet \*note pattern can be made without the plastic canvas but it will not be as sturdy finished measurements 6 15 cm wide side to side 7 17 5 cm wide front to back x 3 5 9 cm tall at back
